The absolute og of all shoter games, and countless countless hours of fun. Plenty of map, gun, and gamemode choices for however you choose to play.
very fun to play with friends
500.000 binden fazla aktif oyuncu, milyonlarca dolarlık pazar değeri bunlara rağmen oyunda hileler eksik olmuyor.

This game is actually very good but the rank up system is so shit that even a real pile of shit does not look like shit next to this. Basicly ranking up is very hard and after you finally rank up after 8 wins, you get fucked hard by valve. What i mean with this is that you can de rank after one lost match. This poor company really needs to improve their rankup system. I want to say to everyone who is thinking on buying this horse crap that don't buy it. There is plenty more better things to do than play this shit.

HAPPY CHRISTMAS TO EVERYONE!
